## How to set my learning goal?

Andy has joined some courses and he would like to set a learning goal for
himself. Now let’s see how Andy will set a learning goal in Curricula.

1\. In Curricula, Andy clicks **My profile** on the left navigation, and then
clicks **Learning goal**.

2\. He clicks **Set goal** , selects the learning goal type from the **Type**
drop-down listand then selects or customises learning time for his goal.

3\. When he finishes setting the learning goal, Andy clicks **Save**.

If Andy sets daily or weekly learning goal, he can view his average learning
time, goal completion rate, and learning time on each day in the current week
on the **Learning goal** page. If Andy sets monthly learning goal, he can view
average learning time, goal completion rate, and learning time on each day in
the current month on the **Learning goal** page. He can also view his learning
history.
